name: DAG Private Equity
overview:
Duff Ackerman & Goodrich (â€œDAGâ€) is a private investment firm formed in 1991. DAG manages investment funds in excess of $1 billion that provide equity capital for management buyouts, acquisition platforms, and ventures (DAG Ventures). DAGâ€™s capital comes from endowments, foundations, financial institutions, public and private pension funds, fund of funds, and high net-worth families and individuals.

DAG Private Equity (â€œDAG PEâ€) invests its equity capital with strong management teams focused on building companies in well-defined, growing market niches in select industry segments â€“ specialty manufacturing, communications, media, and information technology. The core DAG PE team has worked together since the mid-1980â€™s and has developed very strong networks for deal flow, due diligence, and sourcing of entrepreneurial management. Aided by its deep industry knowledge and expertise, DAG PE places primary emphasis on management team leadership, experience, and entrepreneurial skills when evaluating new investment opportunities.
